body.description: Signature ingredient: Made with coconut milk, an ingredient abundant with natural antiseptic fatty acids, and papaya fruit extract to gently remove impurities without drying sensitive skin. Product description: This gentle cleanser effectively lifts away make-up and impurities while infusing skin with the richly hydrating and soothing benefits of jojoba, flax seed, and coconut. Rinses clean for a soft, smooth complexion.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #74,990 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #997 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the best soap for winter also for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: i love this soap so much since i usually use it during winter time. it doesn’t strip the skin of oils for that “squeaky clean” feeling and it’s super gentle. also there’s a gentle scent of mint and a gentle tingle which i love. sometimes i let the soap sit on my face for a minute or so because it’s so moisturizing and gentle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars super-sensitive skin rejoices!
reviews.reviewText: I have skin that just seems to get more sensitive every year, drier and allergic to more and more. (My immune system is a bit messed up.) I've tried a number of gentle face cleansers, and this has become my go-to. I don't normally wear a lot of makeup, but this cleanser and a soft scrubby mitt get almost everything off--sometimes the waterproof mascara needs a little extra help, but that's it--and my skin is left in one piece. I won't pretend that I don't need moisturizer ASAP after washing my face, but with everything else I've tried, I feel like I need moisturizer before I even leave the shower...sadly, that really isn't an exaggeration.If your skin is normal-to-oily, this probably won't work for you, and I completely understand how it gets negative reviews from some people. But if your skin is dry and delicate, try this: it's gentle, the scent is light, it's pretty effective, and it's not expensive for how long it lasts you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product I’ve ever bought!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing. I have dry sensitive skin that breaks out once a month. This has greatly improved the texture, which was a huge issue for me. I don’t mind the smell and I use it with their green tea moisturizer and twice a week with their even advanced sea scrub. My skin looks so good. Like creamy and glowing. It’s a vast improvement, my hormonal acne is even lessened with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a guy and i LOVE IT!
reviews.reviewText: Ok.. first I'm a straight guy (not homo, not metro) that just want to have its face clean before going to bed. My wife convinced of the benefits of using all natural products and then I met Alba Botanica. This cleanser is just great... it smells very nice, feels nice and just cleans very well. Also I think is awesome that it don't have any irritating effect on my eyes. I use it with my Clarisonic and is a great partnership. Just note that you wont get any foam from this, so don't expect it.All in all, great buy!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Enjoyed Using This
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant refreshing summery coconut scent, didn't dry my face. I will buy it again next summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well to remove make up &lightly moisturize
reviews.reviewText: It works well & isn't heavy. I had trouble finding it in the store so am glad Amazon carries it. I don't like heavy cream products. This is not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like both of these products but this is how it came. A hot mess of the bottles amd then the mess in the box they came in. I lost 1/4 of each bottle thanks to how these items were packaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product! It keeps my face clean and healthy. It gives me great confidence knowing I’m washing my face with a product with naturally minded ingredients that do not dry out my face or make my combination skin red like other products in the past. Best of all it smells good!🤩
I love this facial cleanser. Super gentle, smells great. My sensitive skin approves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 31, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I really like Alba products, but this was my first time with the facial wash. I've used it for a few months now & I really like it. I have 'normal' skin, and I feel like it hasn't dried me out or felt too oily. It has a really nice light texture and subtle scent - I really enjoy it. It does pretty well as a makeup remover too.1 year later: I am still using this product, I have bought it many times now, and am still very happy - it leaves my face feeling clean, not oily, and not overly dry. I always follow up with the Alba facial moisturizer - together the combo has been doing great things for my face... and my husband's too (who has combination skin).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Feels so great when on the face
reviews.reviewText: Lovely face wash! Feels so great when on the face! My favourite so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Product is amazing. Leaves my face clean and soft
reviews.reviewText: Product is amazing. Leaves my face clean and soft. It gets rid of all my spots and did not irritate my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product and not tested on animals.perfect!
